amendment.description: Amendment requires the Attorney General, acting through the Office on Violence Against Women, to make grants to States for carrying out a campaign to increase public awareness of issues regarding domestic violence against pregnant women.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 109-236 to provide additional federal funding for programs that have received grants by the Department of Justice (Office of Violence Against Women) for providing counseling and shelter for women and children in crisis pregnancies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan (OH) amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
